Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Moderate interactions with framework functional groups

Other Information.Additional Info: High CO2 uptake observed (15 mmol/g at 35 bar)

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Size exclusion and lack of strong polarizing interactions

Other Information.Additional Info: Negligible H2 uptake due to absence of strong polarizing groups

Sieving Mechanism: Polarizing environment provided by phenolic -OH groups, triazine rings, and carbonyl moieties

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2/H2 selectivity: 191 (60H2/40CO2), Working capacity: 4.5 mmol/g for 10-1 bar swing

Other Information.Additional Info: High hydrophobicity and chemical stability; retains porosity after harsh treatments
